archiefmat.ref_code: Plaatsingslijsten van de kerkelijke archieven op Curacao
archiefmat.titel: Archiefbescheiden van het vicariaat der Dominicanen
archiefmat.titel_eng: Documents of the vicariate of the Dominicans
archiefmat.scope: Contains mainly 20th century material; only limited number of documents from the 19th century, mainly regarding baptisms and marriages.
archiefmat.notes: See also the description of the record "Bisdom Curaçao" in the "Repertorium van Nederlandse zendings- en missie-archieven 1800-1960".
